groups.title: Warren Zevon
groups.text: Underrated, versatile rock singer-songwriter.. 'Above and beyond the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame' - Dave Letterman.

groups.title: Bruce Springsteen
groups.text: Not so underrated New Jersey god of rock.

songs.title: Days like this
songs.text: Gives the same vibe as ‘This too shall pass.’

songs.title: And It Stoned Me
songs.text: Nostalgic song around a rainy scene.

songs.title: Backstreets
songs.text: Angsty nostalgic song. Can't tell if Terry's a guy or not.

songs.title: Wild Night
songs.text: Captures that unqiue feeling of 7pm on a Friday.

songs.title: These are the days
songs.text: Not to be confused with Days like this.

songs.title: Poor Poor Pitiful Me
songs.text: Sometimes, just sometimes, I think I get what he's saying.

songs.title: Lawyers, Guns and Money
songs.text: Really love the 'Dad, get me out of this' part. Some other versions have him saying, 'Dad, get me out of this one' with a different intonation.

songs.title: Carmelita
songs.text: Smith Corona's a typewriter brand. Is it about a man selling his passions to serve his addictions?
